outputs.output_descr:
The project enables the assessment of  capacity needs and helps analyze national priorities and identify how best to mobilize and allocate resources to implement the major environmental
conventions—UNFCCC, the UN Convention on Biological Diversity (UNCBD), and the UN Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD)—in a coordinated and cost-effective manner.

project_descr: The project enables the assessment of capacity needs and analyzes national priorities to implement the major environmental conventions on biodiversity, climate change and land degradation.
